USDJPY.strategy: Conservative trend-following strategy, leaning bullish with caution due to limited data and missing SMA 50. Entry after a slight pullback.

EURUSD.strategy: Mean Reversion, focusing on potential oversold bounce. Requires confirmation due to downward trend.

GBPUSD.strategy: Conservative Mean Reversion/Pullback Play - Buying opportunity on a potential dip, expecting a bounce back towards the 20 SMA
